text: The Mărăloiu is a right tributary of the river Someșul Mic in Romania. It discharges into the Someșul Mic in Apahida. Its length is and its basin size is . ==References== * Screening-ul substanțelor periculoase la domenii de activitate industrială relevante * Trasee turistice - județul Cluj Category:Rivers of Romania Category:Rivers of Cluj County
title: Mărăloiu
